titleStmt.title: The VVelsh doctor: or, The VVelsh-man turned physitian, being a new way to cure all diseases in these distracted times of ours, viz. 1. You shall see by this book that her have skill in all the 12. signs, and knowledge of all the humors, and likewise of her sences in folks podies [sic]. ... 8. Her will do more admirable cures then her cozens in the Colledge of Physitians can do by her Galen and her Hypocrates; ... / By Shinkin ap Morgan, Professor of te [sic] medicall arts and sciences.
titleStmt.author: Morgan, Shinkin ap.

notesStmt.note: Shinkin ap Morgan is a pseudonym.
Originally published as: The Welch doctor.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
